quotes.phrase: Nothing is more badass than treating a woman with respect.
quotes.author: Mr. Torgue

quotes.phrase: It's easy to forget what a sin is in the middle of a battlefield.
quotes.author: Solid Snake

quotes.phrase: Boss... you were right. It's not about changing the world. It's about doing our best to leave the world... the way it is. It's about respecting the will of others, and believing in your own.
quotes.author: Big Boss

quotes.phrase: Thank you Mario! But our Princess is in another castle!
quotes.author: Toad

quotes.phrase: We are moved to tears by the size of this thing.
quotes.author: King of All Cosmos

quotes.phrase: Knowledge is useless if it is not used.
quotes.author: Gixx

quotes.phrase: Working for a better tomorrow isn't just one-time thing. The tomorrows keep coming.
quotes.author: Yu Narukami

quotes.phrase: From the moment we're thrown into this world, we're fated to bring each other nothing but pain and misery.
quotes.author: Psycho Mantis

quotes.phrase: Belive in yourself... If you don't have that... it doesn't matter how many talents you have, you still won't be able to hold your head up high...
quotes.author: Chiaki

quotes.phrase: All your base are belong to us
quotes.author: Cats
